CustomField.description: Used in Pandadoc Integration for estimates/invoices
CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( Shoot_Date_2__c ) = TRUE,Shoot_1_Title_Case__c, IF( Continuous__c = TRUE, Shoot_1_Title_Case__c & " - " &Shoot_2_Title_Case__c, Shoot_1_Title_Case__c & ", " & Shoot_2_Title_Case__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in Pandadoc Integration for estimates/invoices
CustomField.label: zPandadoc - Shoot Date - Text - Lower
